HTTP_STATUS_0.USER: Unknown problem retrieving Users data - please try again.
HTTP_STATUS_0.ROLE: Unknown problem retrieving Role data - please try again.

HTTP_STATUS_401.USER: You are not authorized to see Users.
HTTP_STATUS_401.ROLE: You are not authorized to see Roles.

HTTP_STATUS_403.USER: You have no permissions to see Users.
HTTP_STATUS_403.ROLE: You have no permissions to see Roles.

HTTP_STATUS_500.USER: Unknown server problem retrieving User data - please try again.
HTTP_STATUS_500.ROLE: Unknown server problem retrieving Roles data - please try again.

HTTP_STATUS_504.USER: Timeout retrieving User data - please try again.
HTTP_STATUS_504.ROLE: Timeout retrieving Role data - please try again.
